br.com.caelum.vraptor.proxy
Class DefaultProxifier

java.lang.Object
  br.com.caelum.vraptor.proxy.AbstractCglibProxifier
      br.com.caelum.vraptor.proxy.DefaultProxifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Proxifier
@ApplicationScoped
public class DefaultProxifier
extends AbstractCglibProxifier

Used to create proxy instances for Classes. It will decide whether to use CGLib or DynamicProxies only based on the class to be proxified.

Author:
Fabio Kung

Constructor Detail

DefaultProxifier

public DefaultProxifier()
Method Detail

proxify

public java.lang.Object proxify(java.lang.Class type,
                                MethodInvocation handler)
Create a proxy for the given type using Java Dynamic Proxies if the type is an interface. Otherwise, proxies for concrete classes are created with CGLib.

Parameters:
type - to be proxified
handler - that receives method calls
Returns:
the proxy
